# Data Quality
## Reporting Rate
This is the percentage of submitted reports vs expected reports 

## Absolute Percentage Difference

Compares last month's ending balance and this month's beginning balance

# Stock Status
## Months of Stock

Remaining balance divided by average consumption in the last 3 months

## Stock Out Rate
% of facilities stocked
